text:
Maybe we should just change `show-versioninfo` to be opt-out for nightlies. I'd not have known the meaning of that number, and even now that I know it seems rather confusing to convert that to a commit hash.

Alternatively, and this is to some extent the "recommended" way by GitHub, we could print the full versioninfo when debug logs are enabled. I personally like that option because it quickly lets you toggle without having to push any changes to the workflow but I'm not sure if most people even know about GHA debug logs.
